import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { CommonModule } from '@angular/common'; @Component({ selector: 'app-dashboard', standalone: true, imports: [ CommonModule ], templateUrl: './dashboard.component.html', styleUrls: ['./dashboard.component.scss'] }) export class DashboardComponent implements OnInit { contractsCount = 25; totalRevenue = 2500000; performanceObligations = 42; clientsCount = 18; ngOnInit() { // Mock data loaded } }
